title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title. His standout performances earned him Player of the Year and a place in the PFAI Team of the Year. Hurley re-signed for 2025, continuing as a vital part of the squad.

title: David Hurley - FC 26 - Dec 3, 2025 | SoFIFA
snippet: David Hurley (born 21 October 1998) is an Irish footballer who plays as a central attacking midfielder for Irish club Galway United. In the game FC 26, his overall rating is 59.

title: David Hurley (footballer) - Wikipedia
snippet: He signed a new contract with the club on 1 December 2023. On 1 March 2024, Hurley scored his first League of Ireland Premier Division goal, scoring the winner in a 2–1 victory over Waterford at Eamonn Deacy Park. On 1 November 2024. He scored in a 1–1 draw away to Bohemians at Dalymount Park in the final game of the season as his side finished in 5th place in their first year back in the top flight. Hurley signed up for a 5th season with the club on 30 November 2024. On 20 June 2025...
